blogs.title: Linear Regression
blogs.text: it models the linear relationship b/w a dependent variable and one or more independent variables by fitting a straight line through the data points

blogs.title: Logistic Regression
blogs.text: method used for binary classification, predicting the probability of an outcome by using a sigmoid function to map values between 0 and 1.
